validation.invalidMissMatch: Invalid Confirm password. Password and Confirm Password must be match.
validation.invalidPassword: Invalid password. Password must be at least 8 characters long, and contain a number.

validation.invalidPassword2: Invalid password. Password must have at least one upper case letter.
validation.invalidPassword3: Invalid password. Password must have at least one number.
validation.invalidPassword4: Invalid password. Password must be at least 1 characters like this !@#$%^&*(),.?.
validation.twoDecimalAllowed: Decimal value up to 2 decimal places is allowed.
